description: A collection of circles in a thin diagonal line formation running from the top right corner of the picture to the bottom left corner; at the bottom of the line, there is also a collection of circles in a diamond-shaped formation. Each circle has a different number in the center denoting how many lines stem from that point. There is a black triangle towards the top of the line formation and a very small green triangle in the center of the diamond-shaped formation.

author.name: VertexArchive
author.description: An UNOFFICIAL archive of the New York Times' Vertex puzzle. This account is not affiliated with the NY Times. I just like the triangles.
